title: Richard Burgon – 2022 Comments Over BBC Interviewing Nigel Farage
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Richard Burgon, the Labour MP for East Leeds, on Twitter on 31 October 2022.
content: What a terrible decision by the BBC to interview Nigel Farage over the Manston migrant centre.
What the hell does he have to offer in this debate?
This is the time for a serious discussion on the impact of the Tory’s cruel immigration policies. Not more myths and scapegoating.
